obit.personal_info_component: DUNCAN-PARKER JOYA On the 27th August 2018, suddenly at home, Joya Duncan-Parker (Joyce Parker), aged 69 years, of Clarencefield, formerly of Dumfries
obit.relations_component: loving mum of Paul and Lee, and a much loved nana.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Private.

obit.personal_info_component: STEWART James (Jimmy) Peacefully passed away on Sunday 14th April 2019, Jimmy aged 69 years, of Cornton.
obit.relations_component: devoted dad to Jamie, Shaun, Ann, Christine and her husband Scott, doting grandpa to Naomi, Reice, Rhea, Ethan, Mackenzie, Ellice, Imogine and Aidan, great-grandpa to Rowan.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service will be held at Falkirk Crematorium on Thursday 25th April, at 1.00pm to which all family and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: McCAFFERY Isabella Peacefully at F.V.R.H on Monday 7th October 2019, Isabella McCaffery (nee Johnstone) aged 88 years of Bannockburn and formerly of Cowie.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late James,
obit.relations_component: devoted and caring mum of Edith, Ann, Edward, James, Richard, Tracey and Laura, a much loved mother-in-law, gran and great-gran of the family. She will be sadly missed by all who knew her.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Stirling Crematorium on Friday 18th October at 2pm, to which all relatives and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please."

obit.personal_info_component: "MORE MOIRA Suddenly, but peacefully at home on Monday 17th October, 2016, Moira (nee Russell), aged 78 years of Whins of Milton.
obit.spouse_component: Loving wife of the late Jackie
obit.relations_component: special mum of Carol, Michael, Catherine and Stephen, dearly loved sister to Grace, Cathie and Meg, a much loved mother-in-law, gran and great gran."

obit.personal_info_component: THOMSON Mary (ne Lawson) (Linlithgow) Peacefully, at St Michael's Hospital, Linlithgow, on Monday, April 1, 2019, Mary, aged 83 years
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Bruce
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mother of Edward and Caroline and a much loved granny. She will be sadly missed.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Mass will be held at St Michael's RC Church, Linlithgow, on Friday, April 12, at 10am, followed by interment at Kingscavil Cemetery, arriving at approximately 11.15am. There will be a retiral collection in aid of St Michael's Hospital, Linlithgow for those who wish to donate.

obit.personal_info_component: "VIVERS Jean On 24th July 2019 peacefully at Bankfoot House Moffat, Jean in her 100th year
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Joseph
obit.relations_component: a loving mother of Sally, Nessie and Fiona, a dear grandmother, great grandmother and great great grandmother
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Ruthwell Church on Friday 2nd August at 12:00 noon, thereafter to Churchyard. All friends respectfully invited to attend."

obit.personal_info_component: McCLURG THOMAS On the 9th February 2017, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, Thomas Landers McClurg (Tam), of Criffel Road, Dumfries
obit.spouse_component: beloved husband of the late Violet
obit.relations_component: and a dearly loved father, father-in-law, papa, brother, uncle and friend.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Thursday 23rd February at 11.00am. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired can be given at the service in memory of Tam.

obit.personal_info_component: "WALKER Margaret On the 4th March 2019, suddenly but peacefully at home, Margaret McGarrie Walker, nee Allan, of Martinton Road, Heathhall
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Kenny
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mother, mother-in-law, gran, great gran, aunt and friend to many.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Thursday 14th March at 12.00 noon. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please, donations if desired for the British Heart Foundation can be given at the service in memory of Margaret."

obit.personal_info_component: STEVENSON MARGARET (NEE CRAIG) On 1st December 2016, Margaret of Kilmaurs passed away at Crosshouse Hospital aged 88.
obit.relations_component: Loving mother to Margaret, Craig and Gordon and Nan to grandchildren and great-grandchildren.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral on Friday 9th December at Holmsford Bridge Crematorium at 9am. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: RUSSELL CATHERINE Peacefully on the 18th June 2017 at home, Catherine of Callander.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife to the late Robert Dick Russell
obit.relations_component: much loved mum to Adrian and partner Jan, gran to Kyle, Robyn and Ceira, loving aunt, sister and a friend to all.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will be help at Callander Kirk, Callander on Monday 26th June, 2017 at 11.00am and thereafter to Callander Cemetery to which all friends are respectfully invited. Donations if desired to Cancer Research UK and Strathcarron Hospice.

obit.personal_info_component: KEIR IAN Peacefully, at home on Friday October 7th 2016, Ian aged 84 years of Bannockburn.
obit.spouse_component: Dearly loved husband of the late Sadie
obit.relations_component: much loved dad of Alan, Derek and Steven, much loved father-in-law to Gina and Deborah, loving popo to all the grandchildren and great-grandchildren.
obit.funeral_component: Family flowers only please, donations if desired, to be given to Strathcarron Hospice. For funeral arrangements, please contact David Henderson-Lloyd Funeral Directors on 01786 813231.

obit.personal_info_component: DOCHERTY ANNE CAMPBELL Peacefully at home on Saturday 22nd October 2016.
obit.spouse_component: Anne (nee Meikle) beloved wife of the late William
obit.relations_component: Devoted mum of Anne, Brian, Karen and the late Billy. A much loved gran and great gran
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to which all family and friends are respectfully invited at Woodside Crematorium on Saturday 5th November at 11am.

obit.personal_info_component: CROSS At Wishaw General Hospital on 3rd February 2018, David aged 86 years
obit.spouse_component: beloved husband of the late Nan Kenny
obit.relations_component: much loved dad of Jim and Anne, Moira and John and Dye of Laura, David and Megan
obit.funeral_component: Family flowers only please, donations if desired to Kidney Foundation. For funeral times please contact Henry Dorricott Funeral Services on 01698 882 170.

obit.personal_info_component: HORNELL ANN On the 2nd September 2016, peacefully at Lochmaben Hospital, Ann Hornell nee Wilson, aged 85 years of Brooms Road, Dumfries.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late Ian
obit.relations_component: loving mother and mother-in-law of Senga and Michael and a much loved grandma of Catriona and Hannah.
obit.funeral_component: Service at St. Michaels and South Parish Church, today, Friday 9th September at 1.15pm. Funeral thereafter to Caerlaverock Cemetery. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired to St. Michaels Church Fabric Fund can be given at the service in memory of Ann.

obit.personal_info_component: BLACK DUNCAN Suddenly on 2nd January, 2017 at Edinburgh Hospital after sudden heart failure, Duncan (wee Dunc) Black, aged 59 years of Stirling.
obit.spouse_component: Much loved and missed husband to Helen
obit.relations_component: a loving dad, granda, great grandad and friend to many.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to be held on Wednesday 11th January at St. Mark's Church at 10.30am, thereafter to St. Thomas, Cambusbarron at 11.15am. Donations to Cardiac Arrest Ward at Little France Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh

obit.personal_info_component: PEDEN WILLIAM On the 30th November 2017, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, William David Peden of Islesteps, formerly of Castlewigg, Whithorn
obit.spouse_component: beloved husband of the late Joyce
obit.relations_component: dearly loved dad of Ian and Alan, father-in-law of Daine and Mandy and loved papa of Andrew.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Wednesday 13th December at 1.00pm. All friends respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired to the British Heart Foundation will be received at the service in memory of William.

obit.personal_info_component: GIANNANDREA MARGARET Unexpectedly at home on Friday 12th May 2017, Margaret (nee Kelly), aged 53 years.
obit.relations_component: a devoted, loving mum of Gabriel, a beloved daughter of Terrance and the late Ellen, daughter in law, sister, sister in law and aunt to the family, and a great friend to those who knew her.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Mass will take place on Wednesday 31st May at Our Lady and St Ninians RC Church at 10am, thereafter to Bannockburn Cemetery for 11.15am. Family flowers only please, however donations to Strathcarron Hospice will be gratefully received.

obit.personal_info_component: O'HARE MARY Peacefully at F.V.R.H. on Monday 24th July, 2017, Mary (nee Ferguson), aged 88 years.
obit.spouse_component: Loving wife of the late Ian
obit.relations_component: treasured Mum of Mary, John, Steven, Peter, Ann Marie, Aileen, Eilish and the late David and much loved Nana to all the family.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will be held on Thursday 3rd August at 10am at St. Mary's R.C. Church, thereafter to St. Thomas Cemetery, to which all family and friends are respectfully invited.

obit.personal_info_component: HUGHSON JESSIE After a short illness courageously borne, surrounded by family, Jessie (nee Campbell), aged 85 years passed away at home on Saturday 18th June, 2016.
obit.spouse_component: She was a cherished wife to the late Bill Hughson
obit.relations_component: a very loving mother, grandmother and great grandmother of all the family. Will be sorely missed by all.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place on Friday 24th June at Falkirk Crematorium at 2.30pm, to which all family and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please, but donations if so desired in aid of British Heart Foundation.

obit.personal_info_component: SIMPSON DAVID Peacefully with his family at Cornhill Macmillan Centre, Perth on Sunday 20th November 2016, David William (of Stagecoach, Perth)
obit.relations_component: dearly loved dad of Jacqueline, Carole, Louise, David and Laura, a loved Grandpa of Rebecca and James, a dear brother, son-in-law, father-in-law, brother-in-law and uncle.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral on Monday 28th November service in Perth Crematorium at 11am to which all family and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please but if desired a retiring collection will be taken at the Crematorium for ward 32, Ninewells Hospital and Cornhill Macmillan Centre, Perth.

obit.personal_info_component: HILSON IRENE At Perth Royal Infirmary on Friday 23rd September 2016
obit.relations_component: Irene (nee Stewart), daughter of the late Alexander and Dora, beloved wife of the late Andy much loved mum of Louise and the late Andrena, dearly loved Gran of Gregor, Bruce, Andrew, Iain, Kerr and Mark, a loved Great Gran of Alexander and Hunter, a dear sister of the late Norrie, James and Alex, a dear mother-in-law of Kenny and the late Bryan and a good friend to many.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Today Friday 30th September service in Perth Crematorium at 11.30am to which all family and friends are respectfully invited Family flowers only please but if desired a retiring collection will be taken at the Crematorium for the British Heart Foundation.

obit.personal_info_component: McMILLAN Robert Suddenly on 17th January 2019 as the result of a tragic accident in East Kilbride, Rab (Robert) aged 55 years.
obit.relations_component: beloved dad of Lauren, much loved son of Margaret and the late Robert, loved brother, uncle, great-uncle, son-in-law and brother-in-law who will be sadly missed by all who knew him.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service on Thursday 31st January 2019 at South Lanarkshire Crematorium, Sydes Brae, Blantyre, G72 0TL at 12:30pm to which all friends are respectfully invited. At the request of the family we would ask that all mourners attending the service wear a touch of blue.

obit.personal_info_component: MEIKLEM WINN Peacefully, at Ochil Care Home, Perth, on Friday, January 26th, 2018, Winn, aged 92 years (formerly of the Newrow)
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Fred
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mum of Linda, Fred, Eleanor, Val and John, a proud and loving nana and great nana, a dear mother-in-law and a good friend and neighbour.
obit.funeral_component: A service to celebrate Winn's life will be held in the Knox Chapel, St John's Kirk on Tuesday, February 6th at 1.30pm, to which all family and friends are welcome. No flowers, please.

obit.personal_info_component: MEGSON ELIZABETH Peacefully, at home in Elderslie, on 16th February 2018.
obit.spouse_component: Elizabeth Megson, beloved wife of the late George
obit.relations_component: much loved grandmother to Pauline and Alan, devoted mother to the late Stanley and mother-in-law to Edith, also a proud great-gran to Margot.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service, to which all family and friends are respectfully invited, at Woodside Crematorium, on Monday 5th March at 2pm. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: JOHNSTON MARY Peacefully on Thursday 24th October 2019 within Wishaw General Hospital, surrounded by her loving family,
obit.relations_component: May Johnston, mother of Garry, Steven and Lynne and proud grandmother to Ryan, Danielle, Sean and Natalie.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Mass 9.30am, Tuesday 5th November 2019 at St Ignatius RC Church, Wishaw followed by Full Committal at Cambusnethan Cemetery. All family and friends welcome.

obit.personal_info_component: COLLINS ISABEL (BEL) On the 8th March 2018, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, in the presence of her family, Isabel (Bel) Collins of Yew Tree Place, Mouswald
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mum of Kim and Mark, a loving nana and great-gran.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Wednesday 21st March at 2pm. All friends respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please, donations if desired to the Stroke Ward (D7) at Dumfries Infirmary will be received at the service in memory of Isabel.

obit.personal_info_component: SHARPE Wilma Sadly at Crosshouse Hospital on 16th February 2019, Wilma passed away.
obit.relations_component: a loving mum to William, Jan and belated son Bobby. Also a loving gran to all her grandchildren.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Portland Funeral Parlour on Thursday 28th February at 1.30pm followed by interment at Kilmarnock Cemetery

obit.personal_info_component: ROY William Suddenly at home on Sunday, 19th May 2019.
obit.spouse_component: Bill, beloved husband of the late Irene
obit.relations_component: much loved and devoted dad, papa and great-papa who will be sadly missed.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service, to which all friends are respectfully invited, to be held at Craigton Crematorium on Wednesday 29th May at 10.30am. Family flowers only. Donations in lieu of flowers to Accord Hospice.

obit.personal_info_component: TONNER Peacefuly at home on Friday 7th April 2017, Agnes Tonner (Watt) aged 71 years.
obit.relations_component: Beloved mother, grandmother and great grandmother of the family.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place on Thursday 13th April 2017 in R B Steele's, Ballot Road, Irvine at 1.30pm and thereafter to Kilmarnock Cemetery, Grassyards Road for 2.30pm. The family would then ask for you to join them at The British Legion Club Irvine thereafter, and all are welcome.

obit.personal_info_component: DRYNAN ISOBEL On the 18th February 2019, peacefully in the Alexandra Unit, Isobel May Drynan, ne Parker, New Abbey Road, Dumfries.

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place on Tuesday 26th February at Roucan Loch Crematorium at 1.00pm. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. If so desired, donations to Macmillan Cancer Relief may be given at the service.

obit.personal_info_component: MURIE JESSIE Peacefully, at Summerlee House, Coatbridge, on 25th February 2017, Jessie, aged 90 years.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late John Murie
obit.relations_component: and a much loved mother, grandmother and sister.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Holytown Crematorium on Friday 3rd March 2017 at 1.30pm.

obit.personal_info_component: JARDINE On 27th September 2017, suddenly, Margaret Kathleen (Marleen) Jardine, St. Andrew Drive, Castle Douglas.
obit.relations_component: much loved mum of Patricia, Elspeth and Kenneth and a loving granny.
obit.funeral_component: Following a private cremation a service of thanksgiving will be held on Friday 6th October in Kelton Parish Church at 12.45pm. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. No flowers please. If so desired, donations to Kelton Parish Church may be given at the service.

obit.personal_info_component: DOBBIE ELIZABETH On 17th July 2017, peacefully at Dumfries & Galloway Royal Infirmary, Elizabeth (Betty) nee Bell, of Dryfesdale Court Lockerbie
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Robert
obit.relations_component: a dear sister of Mary a much loved mother of Sarah & Alan, granny to Scott & Clare, Darren & Laura and great granny to James & Cameron.

Family flowers only please, donations if desired to Alzheimer Scotland and Dumfries & Galloway Sands.

obit.personal_info_component: BEGGS Suddenly, result of a tragic accident, Ann passed away on the 4th June 2016, surrounded by her loving family. Ann, aged 74 years
obit.relations_component: loving mum of Ian, gran to Ryan and family. Ann will always be sadly missed. God Bless.

Funeral thereafter to Holmsford Bridge Crematorium, Dreghorn for 3.00pm, all friends are respectfully invited.Family flowers only please, in lieu, donations for The Stroke Unit Crosshouse Hospital would be appreciated.

obit.personal_info_component: MACKINTOSH DEREK Sadly at Craigieknowes Care Home Perth, on Sunday 2nd October 2016, Derek, aged 70 years
obit.relations_component: dearly loved dad of Ailsa, Morna, Rona and Innes, much loved grandad of Jackson, Leah, Emily and Aneurin and a dear father-in-law of Alan, Scott, Rob and Sarah.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral on Friday 14th October service in Perth Crematorium at 2pm to which all family and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please but if desired a retiring collection will be taken at the Crematorium for Alzheimer Scotland.

obit.personal_info_component: JARVIE YVONNE Boghall Peacefully at home, on 5th November 2017, Yvonne, aged 72 years. Yvonne was previously playground supervisor at Boghall Primary School
obit.relations_component: a dear mum to Stephen and grandma to Megan and Sam.
obit.funeral_component: The Funeral service will be held on Wednesday 15th November at 1pm at West Lothian Crematorium, to which all are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please as there will be a retiral collection in lieu of flowers.

obit.personal_info_component: HADLEY MARGARET On 14th March 2019 peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, Margaret Hadley of Durisdeer
obit.relations_component: a much loved sister and aunt.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Tuesday 26th March at 12 noon to which all friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired for Cancer Research UK will be gratefully received in memory of Margaret.

obit.personal_info_component: SNEDDON TOM Boghall Peacefully at St. John's Hospital on 29th October, Tom aged 86 years
obit.spouse_component: a much loved husband of the late Shirley
obit.relations_component: a much loved Dad of Andrea and the late Dawn, devoted Grandpa of Magali and Anne-Laure and a dear father-in-law to Tom.
obit.funeral_component: The funeral service will be held on Monday 11th November at 10am at West Lothian Crematorium to which all are respectfully invited. Grateful thanks are extended to all who cared for Tom with such care and dignity.

obit.personal_info_component: COPLAND SARAH AGNES On 11th March 2017, peacefully at Singleton Lodge, Sarah Agnes Copland (Nancy) nee Fergusson formerly of Lilac Cottage, Wamphray.
obit.spouse_component: A dear wife of the late Edward Copland (Ed)
obit.relations_component: a much loved mother of Eddie and Billy, dear mother-in-law, granny and great granny.

obit.personal_info_component: WATSON Geoff Watson of Dundonald, died suddenly on Wednesday 20th June 2018.
obit.relations_component: father to Chris, Alan and Tracey. Adored by his grandchildren and great-grandchildren. He will be loved and remembered fondly by all his family and friends. What a wonderful life he had.
obit.funeral_component: The family will be celebrating his life at Masonhill Crematorium on Monday 2nd July at 11.15am. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: WATSON John Peacefully after a short illness on Friday 2nd November 2018 at Forth Valley Royal Hospital, John aged 76 years.
obit.relations_component: much loved Dad to Shona, Carol and Iain and a proud Grandad to Chloe, Louise, Jack, Emma, Camryn and Jasmine.
obit.funeral_component: Family flowers only please but if desired donations kindly received will go to F.V.R.H. Ward B12. Funeral will take place on Friday 16th November at Falkirk Crematorium at 10.45am

obit.personal_info_component: GOODWIN DOUGLAS On 24th January 2018, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, in the presence of his family, Douglas Goodwin (Dougie), Ex ICI, of Brownrigg Loaning, Dumfries, formerly of Bloomfield.
obit.relations_component: dearly loved father of Stewart and Andrew, father-in-law of Hazel and Lynn and a much loved papa and great-papa.

obit.personal_info_component: CASSIDY Margaret Peacefully at the Royal Alexandra Hospital on 6th March 2019
obit.spouse_component: Margaret beloved wife of the late Joe
obit.relations_component: sister to Mary and Elizabeth and a friend to many. Reception and Vigil at St. James RC Church Paisley on Wednesday 13th March at 6pm.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Mass on Thursday 14th March at 9.30am thereafter to Woodside Crematorium. All family and friends are respectfully invited.

obit.personal_info_component: FERGUSON ISA On 15th March 2018, peacefully in Dumfries and Galloway Royal Infirmary, Isa Ferguson, Merse Drive, Kirkcudbright.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late George Ferguson
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mum of Tommy and a much loved gran and great gran.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will be held in Kirkcudbright Parish Church today, Thursday 22nd March, at 2.00pm. followed by interment in St. Cuthbert's Churchyard. All friends are respectfully invited to attend.

obit.personal_info_component: KNOX DAVID (MCGIBBON) Peacefully at home on Friday 12th October 2018, surrounded by his loving family.
obit.relations_component: father, papa and great papa.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place at Masonhill Crematorium on Tuesday 23rd October 2018 at 10.30. Sadly missed by all.

obit.personal_info_component: RANKIN JOHN John, aged 83, died peacefully, at Cornhill Macmillan Centre, on Sunday 8th January 2017
obit.relations_component: much-loved dad of Wendy and Elise and a dear brother of Hazel.
obit.funeral_component: A celebration of John's life will be held at Perth Crematorium, on Monday 23rd January at 11.30 a.m., to which all family and friends are welcome. Family flowers only please, but if so desired, donations may be given on leaving the crematorium for John's chosen charities.

obit.personal_info_component: McDADE JOSEPH Suddenly but peacefully at the Royal Alexandra Hospital, surrounded by his family on Sunday, 12th November, 2017
obit.relations_component: much loved Father of Joseph, Christina, Andrew, Graham, Karen and Fiona and adored Grumpy to all his Grandchildren.
obit.funeral_component: Fortified by Rites of the Holy Church R.I.P. Reception and Vigil prayers at St. Mary's R.C. Church on Monday, 20th November at 6.00pm. Funeral Mass on Tuesday 21st November at 9.30am, thereafter to Kilbarchan Cemetery.

obit.personal_info_component: COMBES JOHN CYRIL MASON Peacefully at the Royal Alexandra Hospital on Wednesday 2nd November 2016.
obit.relations_component: loving dad of Rhoda, Stuart and Nicholas. Much loved grandpa of Alexandra, Lisa and Charlotte and brother of Linda Combes.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service, to which all family and friends are respectfully invited, at Woodside Crematorium on Thursday 10th November at 3pm. Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu if desired to the British Heart Foundation.

obit.personal_info_component: LITTLEJOHNS Margaret On 14th February 2019, Margaret of Buxton and formerly of Kirkcudbright, passed away peacefully at The Haddon Hall Care Home, aged 93 years.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late Alan
obit.relations_component: loving mother of Ann, Susan and the late Janet, also a cherished granny and great-granny. She will be greatly missed.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service to take place at Macclesfield Crematorium on 15th March, 2019 at 2pm. Family flowers only please. Donations in memory of Margaret for RNLI may be sent to: R.W. Percival, Heath Street, Buxton, SK17 6LT. Tel: 01298 23056 www.percivalfunerals.co.uk

obit.personal_info_component: CAMPBELL JOHN Peacefully at Forth Valley Royal Hospital on 22nd November, 2017, surrounded by his loving family, John Campbell, aged 72 years.
obit.relations_component: loving dad to Steven, Kevin and Lee, cherished grandad to Claire, Ryan, Gary, Cleo, Eva and Louis and father-in-law to Julie, Debbie and Stevie. Sadly missed by all the family.

Family flowers only please as there will be a retiral collection for those wishing to donate to Kidney Association.

obit.personal_info_component: STEWART David Peacefully at F.V.R.H. on Saturday 2nd February 2019, David McAuslan Stewart aged 86 years of Stirling.
obit.relations_component: Treasured dad of Elaine. Dearest father-in-law of Stuart and a cherished grandpop to Andrew and Rhona. Much loved and sadly missed by his family and many friends.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at the Allan Park South Church on Thursday 14th February at 11.00. Thereafter to St Thomas Cemetery to which all relatives and friends are respectfully invited. Donations if so desired to Alzheimer's Scotland.

obit.personal_info_component: STEWART JIM On 26th March 2018 peacefully at Thornhill Hospital, Jim Stewart of Burnhead
obit.relations_component: much loved dad of Lorna, Graham and Anne Marie, father in law of Kenny, Sue and Billy and a devoted papa and great papa.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Thursday 5th April at 10.00am to which all friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired for Prostate Cancer research will be gratefully received in memory of Jim.

obit.personal_info_component: RICHARDSON ELIZABETH MARTIN Uphall Peacefully, at the home of her daughter Lorraine, on 15th December 2017
obit.relations_component: Betty, loving mum of Maryanne, Alexander, James, Lorraine and Andrea and beloved nanna. Will be sorely missed.
obit.funeral_component: Service to which all are welcome, will be held at Thomas Brown Service Room on Wednesday 3rd January 2018 at 2pm, thereafter to Loaninghill Cemetery at 2.45pm.

obit.personal_info_component: MCPHEE Nancy Suddenly at the Royal Alexandra Hospital on 28th January 2019
obit.relations_component: a much loved mum of Norrie, a devoted and loving gran to Lewis and Mirrin. Sadly missed by all her family and friends.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service at Woodside Crematorium on Thursday 7th February at 3:00pm to which all family and friends are respectfully invited.

obit.personal_info_component: KEELING Sarah (Sadie) Nee Fulton Aged 77, passed away peacefully at Crosshouse Hospital on Thursday 22nd August 2019 after a short illness, bravely borne.
obit.spouse_component: Beloved wife of the late Terry Keeling
obit.relations_component: much cherished daughter, sister, step-mum, granma, great-granma, aunt, friend and neighbour.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service on Wednesday 28th August at St Maurs Glencairn Church, Kilmaurs at 11:45am. Thereafter, at Masonhill Crematorium, Ayr, at 1:15pm. Sleep tight.

obit.personal_info_component: KERR ROBERT On the 4th July 2017, peacefully at his own home, in the presence of his family
obit.spouse_component: Bobby Kerr, beloved partner of Izzy Laurie
obit.relations_component: a dearly loved dad, stepdad and papa.
obit.funeral_component: Service at the Crichton Memorial Church on Thursday 13th July at 11am. Cremation thereafter at Roucan Loch Crematorium. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired to Charity will be received at the service in memory of Bobby.

obit.personal_info_component: STODDART (NEE WILSON) JEAN On Thursday 2nd February 2017, in the loving care of Alma House, Dalbeattie, formerly of Barhill Road, Dalbeattie, Jean Stoddart (nee Wilson)
obit.spouse_component: beloved wife of the late Allan
obit.relations_component: dearly loved mother of the late Allan, Elizabeth and Joyce, loved sister of Betty Watson and late brother Andrew Wilson, and loving and much loved aunt.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral will be held on Monday 13th February at 12noon at Roucan Loch Crematorium, Dumfries to which all friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only. A retiral collection will be offered for Access Adventure.

obit.personal_info_component: O'HALLORAN JACK Peacefully, at Udston Hospital, on the 10th June 2017, Jack
obit.relations_component: loving father to Claire and Suzanne, dearly beloved grandfather and family member to all.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place at St. Leonards RC Church on Monday 19th June, at 10am, then a committal at South Lanarkshire Crematorium at 11am. All Welcome.

obit.personal_info_component: MOFFAT Mary On 19th May 2017, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, Mary Moffat nee Richardson of Kinnell Street, Thornhill
obit.relations_component: a much loved mother of James and Shona and a loving granny and great-granny.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Thornhill Parish Church on Monday 5th June at 11.15am followed by interment at Morton Cemetery. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. A retiring collection will be taken for Crossroads Care in memory of Mary at the service.

obit.personal_info_component: CROALL JOHN On 1st February 2018, peacefully at Dumfries Infirmary, John Croall
obit.relations_component: much loved dad of Keith and cherished grandad. Service at William Jardine Chapel of Rest, 23 Terregles Street, Dumfries today, Friday 9th February, at 9.30am.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral thereafter to Dumfries High Cemetery. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please, donations if desired for Cancer Research can be given at the service in memory of John.

obit.personal_info_component: MURDOCH NINA Armadale Peacefully, at St. John's Hospital, on 23rd April 2017, surrounded by her family, Nina
obit.relations_component: much loved mum of Marnie and Lara, mum-in-law to Evan, proud gran of Tuesday, Charley, Scott, Cerys and Logan, treasured sister of Gilbert, Betty, Brian, Sandra, Elaine, Jim and Isabel. Sadly missed by all her nieces, nephews, friends and neighbours.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral on Thursday 4th May, 3pm at West Lothian Crematorium. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: WHITE Suddenly at home on 2nd January 2018, John
obit.relations_component: a loving dad to Isabelle, William, Jeanette and Robert. A much loved granda to five and great granda to three and also a dear father-in-law and brother who will be sadly missed.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Woodside Crematorium on Tuesday 23rd January at 4pm, to which all friends are respectfully invited.

obit.personal_info_component: CORRIE Margaret On the 24th March 2019, peacefully in Barlochan House Care Home and formerly of Dalry, Margaret Corrie.

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will take place on Tuesday 2nd April in Roucan Loch Crematorium at 11.00am. All friends are respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. If so desired, donations to Alzheimer Scotland may be given at the service.

obit.personal_info_component: ALLEN JENNIFER On 13th May 2018, at Dumfries Infirmary, peacefully after a long illness, Jennifer Allen nee Johnston, aged 56 years of Craignair Park, Annan

obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Friday 25th May at 11am. All friends respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired can be given at the service for Marie Curie in memory of Jennifer.

obit.personal_info_component: ANDERSON ELIZABETH Peacefully at home on 8th January 2019. Elizabeth nee (Neil) died surrounded by her loving family.
obit.spouse_component: Dearly beloved wife of the late Robert Anderson
obit.relations_component: much loved Mum of Gordon, Neil, Aileen and Fiona, a devoted Gran and Great Gran to Gillian, Jennifer, Laura, Louise, Lisa, Sophie, Abigail, Olivia and Oliver.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to which all family and friends are respectfully invited at Kay Park Parish Church, Kilmarnock on Friday 25th January at 11.30 am, thereafter to Masonhill Crematorium, Ayr at 13.15pm. Family Flowers only please. A collection will be taken on retiral for The Ayrshire Hospice.

obit.personal_info_component: JONES Hugh Thomas At Ninewells Hospital on Monday 29th October 2018, Hugh Thomas, (Shug), aged 78, formerly Tayside Fire Brigade
obit.relations_component: loving father of Angela and Mandy, father-in-law and best pop in the world to Ross, Natalie and Melissa, a dear brother-in-law, uncle and good friend to many.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral on Tuesday 6th November, service in Perth Crematorium at 3.00pm to which all family and friends are respectfully invited. Family flowers only please but if desired a retiring collection will be taken for Prostate Cancer UK.

obit.personal_info_component: McGOOKIN RAYMOND Peacefully, at home, on Tuesday 19th December 2017.
obit.relations_component: Ray, much loved dad of Richard, loving granda of Craig, Caitlin, Jamie, Nicole, Chloe, Natalie and Richard.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service to which all family and friends are respectfully invited at Woodside Crematorium, on Wednesday 10th January at 3pm.

obit.personal_info_component: QUINN SHIRLEY Unexpectedly, but peacefully at F.V.R.H. on Friday 12th January, 2018, Shirley Quinn, aged 51 years of Cowie.

obit.personal_info_component: DUNCAN Dave At Ochil Care Home, Perth on Thursday 24th January 2019, Dave, aged 73 years, retired administrator Guide Dogs for the Blind.
obit.relations_component: Loving dad of Jodi, Sarah and John, much loved grandad of Joshua, dearly loved brother of Christeen and the late Evelyn and a dear brother-in-law, uncle and friend to many.

obit.personal_info_component: HAGGARTY DAVID Peacefully on the 13th June 2019 at the Royal Alexandra Hospital, David (Prince Rajah the Magician).

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to which all family and friends are welcome will take place at Woodside Crematorium on Thursday 27th June 2019 at 12 noon.

obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium today, Friday 25th August, at 3pm. All friends respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations if desired to the British Heart Foundation will be received at the service in memory of David.

obit.spouse_gender: beloved wife of the late Billy

obit.personal_info_component: GALBRAITH JESSIE Peacefully, in the tender care of Richmond House, Crieff, on Thursday 22nd June 2017, Jessie (nee Aitken) aged 89 years, of Crieff.
obit.relations_component: Dearly beloved mother of Colin, Raymond and Alice, loving sister, aunty, grandmother, great-grandmother and great-great-grandmother. A friend to all who knew her.

Family flowers only please, but donations may be given at the Church door, if so desired, in aid of Richmond House Care Home Fund.

obit.personal_info_component: SEAGRAVE David On the 30th September 2019, peacefully in the dedicated care of the Alexandra Unit, David Robert Seagrave, former Chief Inspector of Police and retired solicitor

obit.personal_info_component: HAYMARCH Hugh Suddenly on 31st July 2019, Hugh aged 74 years
obit.relations_component: much loved dad to Gary, Mark and Debbie, devoted papa and great grandpa, he will be dearly missed by all who knew him.
obit.funeral_component: The funeral service will take place at Masonhill Crematorium on Tuesday 13th August 2019 at 11.15am. Family flowers only please, in lieu of flowers donations to Chest Heart and Stroke Scotland.

obit.personal_info_component: SHAW DOROTHY ELIZABETH Peacefully at Glenfairn Care Home on Wednesday 26th October 2016, Dorothy. She was a former Administrator at Ayrshire Post in the late 70's, also former Booking Clerk at Butlin's Holiday Camp
obit.relations_component: sister of Mary, sister-in-law of Janet and Allan and a loving aunt of the family.

obit.personal_info_component: MUNDY KATE Peacefully after a long illness on Thursday 22nd December, 2016, Kate (nee Milne), of Alloway Drive, Cowie.

obit.funeral_component: For funeral arrangements, please contact David Henderson-Lloyd Funeral Directors on 01786 813231. Family flowers only please, donations if desired, to be given to F.V.R.H. Stroke and Heart Unit.

obit.personal_info_component: SHIELDS Thomas (Tam) Suddenly at home on Thursday 2nd May 2019

obit.relations_component: a dearly loved dad of Yvonne and Laura, father-in-law of Alex and Andrew, a doting papa to Abby and a friend to many. Our hearts are broken.

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to be held at 12.30pm, on Wednesday 8th November 2017 at Mortonhall Crematorium, Edinburgh. All welcome. Family flowers only.

obit.relations_component: much loved brother-In-law, uncle, great-uncle and friend to many.

obit.relations_component: loving mum to Lynn and Frances, mother-in-law, gran and great gran. Sadly missed.

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Masonhill Crematorium on Tuesday 1 May at 12 noon.

obit.personal_info_component: DOUGLAS STEWART DANIEL (MR CARLTON) Peacefully at The Royal Alexandra Hospital, Paisley on 22nd November 2018

obit.funeral_component: Funeral service to which all are invited at Woodside Crematorium, Paisley on Friday 30th November at 11.00am. Family flowers only please.

obit.personal_info_component: JACK PETER FRANCIS Peacefully at Fairview Nursing Home on Wednesday 9th May, 2018, Peter, aged 87 years, formerly of Braehead Road, St. Ninians.

obit.relations_component: beloved son of the late Janet Chalmers. James will be sadly missed by all his family and friends.

obit.personal_info_component: WILSON SUZAN Suzan (nee Miller) passed away peacefully on 27th April, 2017, aged 79 years.
obit.relations_component: mother of Steven Livingstone, mother-in-law of Lesley and grandmother of Duncan. Will be sadly missed by all of the families and her many friends.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service will be held at Bonnybridge St. Helen's Parish Church on Friday 5th May at 1pm. Family flowers only please, donations would be appreciated to Strathcarron Hospice and Beatson Cancer Care.

obit.personal_info_component: ADAMS Jim On the 20th June 2019, peacefully at Allanbank Care Home, Jim Adams R.I.P. (Jumbo), aged 85 years of Glentrool Road, Lochside.

obit.personal_info_component: EVANS EUPHEMIA (EFFIE) Peacefully, at Redmill Care Home, on 11th June 2017, Effie
obit.relations_component: much loved mum, gran, great gran, auntie, sister and friend.
obit.funeral_component: Sadly missed. Funeral service to be held at West Lothian Crematorium on Friday 23rd June 2pm, which all are welcome. No flowers please.

obit.personal_info_component: DAWSON Peacefully at home, Beannie Farm, Braco on August 4th 2017, Jamie, aged 55 years.

obit.relations_component: caring and dearly loved dad of Aaron, Ross and Emily, only son of Jim and the late Anna, special brother and great friend to many.

obit.personal_info_component: HUME IAN Peacefully after a short illness, in the company of his loving family at Forth Valley Royal Hospital on 31st December 2017.

obit.personal_info_component: McLAREN THOMAS (TOM) Suddenly at home, Thomas (Tom) passed away on Friday 21st September 2018.
obit.relations_component: A beloved son of Mia and the late Tommy and a much loved brother of David, Kenneth, Tricia and Margaret. Will be sadly missed by all family and friends.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral Service at Woodside Crematorium on Monday 15th October at 1pm. Donations in lieu of flowers, if so desired to Multiple Sclerosis Society Scotland.

obit.personal_info_component: McCLENAGHAN DAVID Suddenly on Sunday 26th August, 2018, David McClenaghan, aged 57 years of Bannockburn, formerly of Enniskillen, Northern Ireland.
obit.relations_component: treasured dad of Rachel and Joshua, a loving son of Audrey and the late David (Davy), dearest son-in-law to Etta. He will be sadly missed by his family and many friends.

obit.personal_info_component: CRONIE Julie On the 22nd October 2019, peacefully at home, Julie Cronie, aged 40 years of Burnett Avenue, Lochside.
obit.relations_component: Much loved mother of Sarah-Jane and Rebecca-Lee, and a dear friend to many.
obit.funeral_component: Service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Wednesday, 6th November 2019 at 12.00 noon. All friends are respectfully invited to attend.

obit.personal_info_component: BYRNE JOHN Seafield Unexpectedly, at home, on Thursday 4th May 2017, Johnny, aged 78 years
obit.relations_component: loving and much much loved father of Sean, Marie-Louise, Michael, Damian and Emma, doting grandad of ten.

obit.personal_info_component: CROCKETT George Unexpectedly at F.V.R.H. on Thursday 27th September, 2018, George aged 81 years
obit.relations_component: much loved dad to Margo, dear grandpa of Stuart, Lynsey and Leigh, doting great grandpa of Ritchie, Ryan, Charley and Chloe.

obit.personal_info_component: PATERSON JAMIE Peacefully at the Queen Elizabeth University Hospital on Wednesday 15th June 2016, after an illness bravely borne with his family by his side, Jamie aged 31 years of Ae Village.
obit.relations_component: Much loved son, brother, grandson and friend.
obit.funeral_component: Funeral service at Roucan Loch Crematorium on Friday 24th June at 10.30am. All friends respectfully invited to attend. Family flowers only please. Donations in lieu if desired to Beatson Cancer Charity and Dumfries & Galloway Canine Rescue Centre.

obit.personal_info_component: COUTTS VIOLET Peacefully at Ward 36, the Royal Alexandra Hospital, Paisley on 11th April 2017.
obit.spouse_component: Violet (nee Armstrong). Beloved wife of the late Albert
obit.relations_component: much loved mother of John, Adam, Albert and the late David. Loving mother in law to Marion, Irene, Roseanne and the late Jean. Devoted Grandmother to Fiona, David, Alan, Emma, Jillanne, Leanne, Lynsey and Lauren. Cherished great grandmother to Rebecca, Daniel, Jake, Cassie, Maddison, Tori-Leigh, Brogan, Faith and Robyn and a dear sister and Aunt of the family.
